Text: High Lonesome (Randy Travis album):  Four singles were released from the album: "Forever Together" (#1 on the "Billboard" Hot Country Songs charts), "Better Class of Losers" (#2), "Point of Light" (#3), and "I'd Surrender All" reached number 20.
